name: Tree Decorator Extravaganza: Super Ornament Blizzard
name_original: Tree Decorator Extravaganza: Super Ornament Blizzard
description:
Tree Decorator Extravaganza: Super Ornament Blizzard Catch falling ornaments to decorate the Christmas tree in this cozy holiday experience Send the game to a friend with a special gift code for a holiday surprise. Created in 48 hours for the 2021 Holiday Card Jam Instructions

Click and drag the tree to decorate it with falling ornaments.  Fill up the tree to complete it with a star.

If you were sent a gift code, redeem it before you play for a surprise.

Create Gift Code

Enter your giftee’s name for a unique gift code. If they input their gift code at the start of the game, the card at the end will be addressed to them.

Credits

Programming: John Peter McGrath & Dan Mellott

Sound and Music: Christopher Reeves

Art: Kasey Sanchez

Production: WhatNames

Winter Scene Background

MinimalPixel Font

🎄 Thank you for playing! 🎄
